basic.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox3" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox3"> Weapons</label>

basic.desc: If there is another character at your location, you may evade a bane; a random other character at your location encounters it instead.
Add 1d4 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"> +1</label>) to your check to acquire a boon.
When you acquire a boon on your turn, roll 1d6; on a (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>3,) 4, 5, or 6, explore your location.

kleptomaniac.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="profbox2"> Heavy Armors</label>
<input id="profbox3" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox3"> Weapons</label>

kleptomaniac.desc: If there is another character at your location, you may evade a bane; a random other character at your location encounters it instead.
Add 1d4 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"> +1</label>) (<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"> +1</label>) to your check to acquire a boon.
When you acquire a boon on your turn, roll 1d6; on a (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>3,) 4, 5, or 6, explore your location.
<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox"/><label for="powbox3"></label> When you close a location, add a plunder card from the box to your hand.
<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox"/><label for="powbox4"></label> If another character at your location fails a check to acquire a boon, you may attempt a check to acquire it.

<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox"/><label for="powbox5"></label>  When you receive plunder cards for successfully completing a scenario, you may banish any 1 of those cards and replace it with another plunder card from the box.
<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox"/><label for="powbox6"></label> Discard a card from the blessings deck to explore your location.

wrecker.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="profbox2"> Heavy Armors</label>
<input id="profbox3" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox3"> Weapons</label>

wrecker.desc: If there is another character at your location, you may evade a bane; a random other character at your location encounters it instead.
Add 1d4 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"> +1</label>) to your check to acquire a boon.
When you acquire a boon on your turn, roll 1d6; on a (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>3,) 4, 5, or 6, explore your location.
<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox"/><label for="powbox3"></label> Recharge a card to add 2d4 to your check to defeat a barrier or a henchman, then discard the top 1d4 cards from your deck.

<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox"/><label for="powbox4"></label> At the end of your move step, if you are the only character at your location, you may move a random other character to your location.
<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox"/><label for="powbox5"></label>  After you defeat a monster from a location deck, you may examine the top card of that deck; if itâ€™s a boon, banish it.

<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox"/><label for="powbox6"></label>  If you defeat a henchman by at least 6, add 1d6 (<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox"/><label for="powbox7"></label>2d6) to your check to close the location, if any.

basic.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>

basic.desc: You may recharge a card that has the Divine trait to examine the top card of any location deck (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+1</label> or the blessings deck or any character deck).
At the end of your turn, you may discard a card that has the Divine trait to add a card that has the Divine trait from your discard pile to your hand.
If your combat check has the Attack trait, add 2 to it. (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2">+1</label> You may also add the Fire trait.)
<small>Alahazra cannot keep weapons in her deck between scenarios.</small>

stargazer.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>

stargazer.desc: You may recharge a card that has the Divine trait to examine the top card of any location deck (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+1</label> or the blessings deck or any character deck).
<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label> When you use the above power to examine a card from a location deck on your turn, and it is a boon, you may encounter it.
<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3"></label> When you use the above power to examine a card from a character deck, that character may recharge it.

At the end of your turn, you may discard a card that has the Divine trait (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4"></label> or any card) to add a card that has the Divine trait from your discard pile to your hand (<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label> or to allow a character at your location to add a card from his discard pile to his hand).

If your combat check has the Attack trait, add 2 (<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label>3) to it. (<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label> You may also add the Fire trait.)
<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label> You gain the skill Perception (<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label>and Survival): Charisma +2.

tempest.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>

tempest.desc: You may recharge a card that has the Divine trait to examine the top card of any location deck (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+1</label> or the blessings deck or any character deck).
At the end of your turn, you may discard a card that has the Divine trait to add a card that has the Divine trait from your discard pile to your hand.

If your combat check has the Attack trait, add 2 (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3">3</label>) (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4">4</label>) to it. (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2">+1</label> You may also add the (<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label> Electricity or) Fire trait.)

<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label> Add 2 (<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7">4</label>) to your check to recharge (<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label> or acquire) a spell that has the Attack trait.
<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label> When you play a spell that has the Attack trait, you gain the skill Arcane: Charisma +2 until the end of the encounter.

basic.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

basic.desc: For your check that has or is against a card that has the Finesse trait, you gain the skill Melee: Dexterity +2.

If your check has the Swashbuckling trait (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label> or is a check to defeat a ship), you may reroll 1 die (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label> or 2 dice) on your check; you must take the second result.
Reduce Structural damage to your ship by 1.

pirate queen.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

pirate queen.desc: For your check that has or is against a card that has the Finesse trait, you gain the skill Melee: Dexterity +2.

If your check has the Swashbuckling trait (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label> or is a check to defeat a ship), you may reroll 1 die (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label> or 2 dice) on your check; you must take the second result.
Reduce Structural damage to your ship by 1 (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3"></label> 2).
<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3"></label> You gain the skill Diplomacy (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4"></label> and Craft): Charisma +3.
<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4"></label> When you acquire a card that has the Pirate or Swashbuckling trait, you may immediately explore again.
<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label> You may reveal a card that has the Swashbuckling trait to add the Swashbuckling trait to your check.

<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label>  If you are on a ship, you may move at the end of your turn (<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label> or the character commanding your ship may move at the end of her turn).

duelist.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

duelist.desc: For your check that has or is against a card that has the Finesse trait, you gain the skill Melee: Dexterity +2 (<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label>+3).

If your check has the Swashbuckling trait (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label> or is a check to defeat a ship), you may reroll 1 die (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label> or 2 dice) on your check; you must take the second result.
Reduce Structural damage to your ship by 1.

<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3"></label> When you defeat a monster on your turn, and your check to defeat has the Swashbuckling trait, you may discard (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4"></label> or recharge) a card to immediately explore.
<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4"></label> When you acquire a card that has the Finesse or Ranged trait, you may immediately recharge it to draw a card.

<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label> You may recharge an ally to recharge a random card (<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label> or a weapon of your choice) from your discard pile.
<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label>  If any die rolled on your check is an 8 or higher, roll 1d4 and add it to the result.

basic.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

basic.desc: You may recharge a card to add 1d4 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+1</label>) (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2">+2</label>) to any check by a character at your location.
When you would recharge a card, you may shuffle it into your deck instead.
For your check that has or is against a card that has the Finesse trait, you gain the skill Melee: Dexterity +1.

sea singer.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

sea singer.desc: You may recharge a card to add 1d4 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+1</label>) (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2">+2</label>) (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3">+3</label>) to any check by a character at your location.
When you would recharge a card, you may shuffle it into your deck instead.
For your check that has or is against a card that has the Finesse trait, you gain the skill Melee: Dexterity +1.

<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4"></label> Add 1d4 (<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label>2d4) (<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label>3d4) to your non-combat check to defeat a bane (<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label> or ship).

<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label> For your combat check against a bane that has the Aquatic trait, you may use your Diplomacy skill + 1d6 and add the Magic and Mental traits; you may additionally discard a card to add another 1d8. This counts as playing a spell.
<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label> When you roll on the Plunder Table, you may add or subtract 1 from the result.

freebooter.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

freebooter.desc: You may recharge a card to add 1d4 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+1</label>) (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2">+2</label>) (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3">+3</label>) to any check by a character at your location.
When you would recharge a card, you may shuffle it into your deck instead.
For your check that has or is against a card that has the Finesse trait, you gain the skill Melee: Dexterity +1.

<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4"></label> For your check that has or is against a card that has the Firearm trait, gain the skill Ranged: Dexterity +2 until the end of the encounter.

<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label> When you encounter a bane that has the Task (<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label> or Pirate) trait (<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label> or a ship), you may recharge any number of allies; for each ally recharged, add 1d6 to the check to defeat the bane.

<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label> When you play a blessing on any check that has the Swashbuckling (<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label> or Firearm) trait, add a d12 instead of the normal die.

basic.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

basic.desc: When you play a weapon that has the Firearm trait, if you would bury it or shuffle it into your deck, you may keep it and instead perform the required action with another card.

You may shuffle a card from your hand into your deck to add 1d4 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+1</label>) (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2">+2</label>) (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3">+3</label>) to any combat check at another location.

musketeer.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

musketeer.desc: When you play a weapon that has the Firearm trait, if you would bury it or shuffle it into your deck, you may keep it and instead perform the required action with another card.

You may shuffle a card from your hand into your deck to add 1d4 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+1</label>) (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2">+2</label>) (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3">+3</label>) (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4">+4</label>) to any combat check at another location.
<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label> If you begin your turn with no weapons in your hand, you may draw a card.

<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label> When you play a weapon that has the Firearm trait on your combat check, you may immediately shuffle another such weapon into your deck to draw a card.

<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label> Add 2 (<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label> 3) (<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label> 4) to your combat check that has the Firearm trait.
<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label> You may discard a weapon to defeat a barrier that has the Cache, Lock, or Skirmish trait.

deadeye.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

deadeye.desc: When you play a weapon that has the Firearm trait, if you would bury it or shuffle it into your deck, you may keep it and instead perform the required action with another card.

You may shuffle a card from your hand into your deck to add 1d4 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+1</label>) (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2">+2</label>) (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3">+3</label>) (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4">+4</label>) to any combat check at another location.

<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label> When you encounter a bane, you may attempt a Perception check with a difficulty of 5 plus the adventure deck number of the bane, if any, to evade it.

<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label> When you are on a ship and a random ship is summoned, you may draw 2 (<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label> or 3) such cards and choose 1.
<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label> When you would fail a combat check that has the Firearm trait, you may discard a weapon to add 1d4 to your result.

<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label> When you move to a different location during your move step, you may examine the top card of that location deck (<input id="powbox10" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox10"></label> and shuffle it into the deck).

basic.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

basic.desc: You may evade your encounter.

If you are the only character at your location, you may recharge a card to add 1d6 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+1</label>) (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2">+2</label>) to your combat check.

shadow.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

shadow.desc: You may evade your encounter (<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label>and if it is a boon, you may put it on top of the location deck).

If you are the only character at your location, you may recharge a card to add 1d6 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+1</label>) (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2">+2</label>) (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3">+3</label>) (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4">+4</label>) to your combat check (<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label>and discard it to add an additional 1d6).
For your check that has or is against a card that has the Finesse trait, you gain the skill Melee: Dexterity +1.

<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label> When a monster deals damage to you before (<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label>or after) you act, reduce that damage to 0.
<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label> You automatically succeed at your Knowledge check.

desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

smuggler.desc: You may evade your encounter (<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label>If the encountered card has the Pirate or Swashbuckling trait, you may immediately explore again.).

If you are the only character at your location, you may recharge a card to add 1d6 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+1</label>) (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2">+2</label>) (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3">+3</label>) to your combat check.
For your check that has or is against a card that has the Finesse trait, you gain the skill Melee: Dexterity +1.
<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4"></label> Add 1d4 (<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6">+1</label>) to your non-combat check.
<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label> When you acquire a card, you may give it to another character.
<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label> When a character gives you a card on his turn, he may give you any number of cards.
<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label> When one or more plunder cards are stashed on your turn, you may stash an additional plunder card.

basic.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

basic.desc: Choose a weapon that doesnâ€™t have the 2-Handed trait and a spell that has the Attack trait. When you play one for your combat check, you may recharge the other (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label>or shuffle it into your deck) to add 1d6 (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>2d6) and that cardâ€™s traits to the check.
At the end of your turn, you may attempt to recharge a spell in your discard pile.

marauder.name: Proficient

<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

marauder.desc: Choose a weapon that doesnâ€™t have the 2-Handed trait and a spell that has the Attack trait. When you play one for your combat check, you may recharge the other (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label>or shuffle it into your deck) to add 1d6 (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>2d6) (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3"></label>3d6) and that cardâ€™s traits to the check.
At the end of your turn, you may attempt to recharge a spell in your discard pile.
<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4"></label> You may discard a spell that has the Attack trait to add 1d6 (â–¡ 2d6) to any check to defeat a ship or barrier.
<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label> You gain the skill Ranged: Intelligence +2.

<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label> When you discard (<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label>or recharge) a card that has the Pirate or Swashbuckling trait, you may draw 1 card (<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label>or 2 cards).
<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label> When you play a blessing on a Craft check, recharge the blessing.

spellblade.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

spellblade.desc: Choose a weapon that doesnâ€™t have the 2-Handed trait and a spell that has the Attack trait. When you play one for your combat check, you may recharge the other (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label>or shuffle it into your deck) to add 1d6 (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>2d6) (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3"></label>3d6) and that cardâ€™s traits to the check.
At the end of your turn, you may attempt to recharge a spell in your discard pile.
<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4"></label> When you play a weapon that has the Sword trait, you may add your Intelligence skill to your combat check..
<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label> Add 2 (<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6">4</label>) to your check to acquire a spell or a weapon.
<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label> When you acquire a spell or a weapon on your turn, you may immediately explore again.

<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label> Discard a spell to put a weapon from your discard pile into your hand (<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label>or discard a weapon to put a spell from your discard pile into your hand).

basic.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox3" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox3"> Heavy Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

basic.desc: Add 1d4 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+1</label>) to another characterâ€™s combat check at your location.
When you would discard a weapon for its power, you may recharge it (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>or shuf e it into your deck) instead.

corsair.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox3" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox3"> Heavy Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

corsair.desc: Add 1d4 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+1</label>) (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3">+2</label>) (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4">+3</label>) to another characterâ€™s combat check at your location.
When you would discard a weapon for its power, you may recharge it (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>or shuf e it into your deck) instead.
<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label> You may recharge a weapon to add the Swashbuckling trait to your check.

<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label> Add 2 (<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7">4</label>) to your check to defeat a monster that has the Captain or Pirate trait or a ship.
<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label> When you would put a barrier faceup on top of a location deck, you may shuf e it facedown into the deck instead.

<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label> Recharge a card to reduce Structural damage dealt to your ship by 1 (<input id="powbox10" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox10">2</label>).

tactician.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox3" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox3"> Heavy Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

tactician.desc: Add 1d4 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+1</label>) (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3">+2</label>) (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4">+3</label>) (<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5">+4</label>) to another characterâ€™s combat check at your location.
When you would discard a weapon for its power, you may recharge it (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>or shuf e it into your deck) instead.

<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label> You may recharge an ally to add 1 plus its adventure deck number, if any, to your combat (<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label>or non-combat) check.
<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label> When another character encounters a villain, you may immediately move.
<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label> Add 2 (<input id="powbox10" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox10"></label>) to your check to defeat a henchman or villain.

basic.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

basic.desc: You may discard a card to add 1d6 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+1</label>) (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2">+2</label>) and the Poison or Fire trait to any combat check at your location; if the discarded card has the Alchemical trait, add an additional 1d6.
When you play a card that has the Alchemical trait and would banish it, you may recharge it instead.
You gain the skills Arcane and Divine equal to your Craft skill while you play or when you would banish a spell that does not have the Attack trait.

grenadier.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

grenadier.desc: You may discard a card to add 1d6 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+1</label>) (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2">+2</label>) (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3">+3</label>) and the Poison or Fire (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4"></label>or Acid, Cold, Electricity, or Mental) trait to any combat check at your location; if the discarded card has the Alchemical trait, add an additional 1d6 (<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label>1d12).
When you play a card that has the Alchemical trait and would banish it, you may recharge it instead.
You gain the skills Arcane and Divine equal to your Craft skill while you play or when you would banish a spell that does not have the Attack trait.

<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label> When you acquire a boon that has the Alchemical or Liquid (<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label>or Firearm) trait, you may immediately explore again.
<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label> When you succeed at a Craft check, you may examine the top card of your deck; if it is an item, you may add it to your hand.

chirurgeon.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

chirurgeon.desc: You may discard a card to add 1d6 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+1</label>) (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2">+2</label>) and the Poison or Fire trait to any combat check at your location; if the discarded card has the Alchemical (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3"></label>or Healing) trait, add an additional 1d6.
When you play a card that has the Alchemical trait and would banish it, you may recharge it instead.
You gain the skills Arcane and Divine equal to your Craft skill while you play or when you would banish a spell that does not have the Attack trait.

<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4"></label> When you acquire a boon that has the Alchemical or Liquid (<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label>or Healing) (<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label>or Fire or Poison) trait, you may immediately explore again.
<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label> You may recharge an item that has the Alchemical trait to add 1d4 to your check.
<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label> When you reset your hand, you may discard any number of cards to increase your hand size by that number until the end of your turn.

basic.desc: When any character at your location attempts a check to acquire a spell or defeat a monster (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label>or barrier), you may recharge a card to reduce the dif culty of that check by 1 (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2">2</label>) plus the adventure deck number of the recharged card, if any.
You may discard an ally that has the Animal trait to return a spell from your discard pile to your hand.

sea witch.desc: When any character at your location attempts a check to acquire a spell or defeat a monster (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label>or barrier), you may recharge a card to reduce the dif culty of that check by 1 (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2">2</label>) plus the adventure deck number of the recharged card, if any.
You may discard (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3"></label>or recharge) an ally that has the Animal trait to return a spell from your discard pile to your hand.
<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4"></label> You may discard a card to evade a bane that has the Aquatic trait (â–¡ and you may put the bane on top of the deck).

<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label> You may recharge a card to add 2d4 to your Fortitude (<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label>or Survival) check.
<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label> When you close a location, you may move.

<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label> When you play Blessing of Hshurha, or you play any blessing on any check to defeat a bane that has the Aquatic trait, you may recharge it instead of discarding it.

hexer.desc: When any character at your location attempts a check to acquire a spell or defeat a monster (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label>or barrier), you may recharge a card to reduce the dif culty of that check by 1 (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2">2</label>) (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3">3</label>) plus the adventure deck number of the recharged card, if any.
You may discard an ally that has the Animal trait (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4"></label>or any ally) to return a spell from your discard pile to your hand.

<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label> When you would shuf e a non-henchman, non-villain monster you encountered into a location deck, you may exchange it for a random monster from the box.

<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label> When you succeed at a Craft check (<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label>or play a spell that has the Arcane trait), you may examine the top card of your deck; if itâ€™s a spell (<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label>or ally), you may add it to your hand.

<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label> When you play Blessing of Pharasma, or you play any blessing on any check to acquire an ally, you may recharge it instead of discarding it.

basic.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

basic.desc: When you play an ally that has the Animal trait, if you would recharge, discard, or bury it for its power, you may instead shuf e it into your deck (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label>or put it on top of your deck).
You may discard a card to use a d12 for your Strength or Dexterity die; if the check is against a card that has the Animal or Aquatic trait, recharge the card instead.

feral druid.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

feral druid.desc: When you play an ally that has the Animal trait, if you would recharge, discard, or bury it for its power, you may instead shuf e it into your deck (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label>or put it on top of your deck).

You may discard a card to use a d12 for your Strength or Dexterity (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>or Constitution) die; if the check is against a card that has the Animal or Aquatic trait, recharge the card instead.

<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3"></label> For your combat check, you may reveal a card that has the Divine trait to use your Strength skill + 1d8 and add the Magic and Melee (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4"></label>and Fire, Cold, or Electricity) traits; you may not play a weapon on the check.

<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label> Add 2 (<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6">4</label>) to your check against a card that has the Animal trait.
<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label> Recharge a card to reduce Combat damage dealt to you by 1 (<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8">2</label>).

aquamancer.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

aquamancer.desc: When you play an ally that has the Animal trait, if you would recharge, discard, or bury it for its power, you may instead shuf e it into your deck (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label>or put it on top of your deck).
You may discard a card to use a d12 for your Strength or Dexterity die; if the check is against a card that has the Animal or Aquatic trait, recharge the card instead.
<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label> When you succeed at a check to recharge a spell that has the Attack trait, you may put it on top of your deck instead.

<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3"></label> Recharge a card to reduce Acid, Cold, Electricity, or Fire damage dealt to you by 1 (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4">2</label>).

<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label> Add 2 (<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6">4</label>) to any combat check by a character at your location against a card that has the Aquatic trait (<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label>or any check by that character against a ship).

<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label> If you defeat a monster that has the Aquatic trait and would banish it, you may put it in your hand. You may banish a monster from your hand to add 1d4 to any combat check at your location.

basic.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox3" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox3"> Heavy Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

basic.desc: When another character attempts any check, you may display any number of blessings and weapons; for each card displayed, add 1 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">2</label>) to the check. Return the displayed cards to your hand before you reset it (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>and at the start of your turn).

Instead of your  rst exploration on a turn, you may reveal a blessing or armor to choose a character at your location. Shuf e 1d4+1 (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3">+2</label>) random cards from her discard pile into her deck, then discard the card you revealed.

Battle Chaplain.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox3" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox3"> Heavy Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

Battle Chaplain.desc: When another character attempts any check, you may display any number of blessings and weapons; for each card displayed, add 1 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">2</label>) to the check. Return the displayed cards to your hand before you reset it (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>and at the start of your turn).

Instead of your  rst exploration on a turn, you may reveal a blessing or armor to choose a character at your location. Shuf e 1d4+1 (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3">+2</label>) (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4">+3</label>) random cards from her discard pile into her deck, then discard the card you revealed.
<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label> When you encounter an ally, you may banish it and immediately explore again.

<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label> You may automatically succeed at your check to acquire (<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label>or recharge) a card that has the Healing trait.

<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label> When a character plays a blessing on your combat or Strength check, that character may recharge (<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label>that blessing or) a random card from her discard pile.

Shield of Gorum.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox3" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox3"> Heavy Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

Shield of Gorum.desc: When another character attempts any check, you may display any number of blessings and weapons; for each card displayed, add 1 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">2</label>) to the check. Return the displayed cards to your hand before you reset it (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>and at the start of your turn).

Instead of your  rst exploration on a turn, you may reveal a blessing or armor to choose a character at your location. Shuf e 1d4+1 (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3">+2</label>) random cards from her discard pile into her deck, then discard the card you revealed.

<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4"></label> When another character at your location is dealt damage, you may reveal an armor to reduce that damage by 1; you may instead discard that armor to reduce the damage by 2 (<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4">3</label>) (<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6">4</label>).

<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label> When you would bury an armor or weapon, you may discard (<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label>or recharge) it instead.
<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label> Add 2 to your check to defeat a monster that has the Human trait.

<input id="powbox10" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox10"></label> When a character plays a blessing on your combat or Strength check, that character may recharge a random card from her discard pile; if the played card is Blessing of Gorum, the character may  rst recharge the blessing.
